snippet: Chelsea defeated Stoke, 2-1, strengthening its grip on the top spot in the English Premier League with eight matches to go.
lead_paragraph: Chelsea defeated Stoke, 2-1, strengthening its grip on the top spot in the English Premier League with eight matches to go.

headline.main: Goals, if Not Results, Offer Thrills as Chelsea Cruises
headline.print_headline: In Premier League, Goals, Not Results, Offer Thrills
